instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Fry the beef and onion to brown. Add the harissa paste and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the chickpeas, tomatoes and 100ml stock, cover and cook for 5-6 minutes. Transfer to an ovenproof serving dish.

Meanwhile, place the couscous in a bowl, add the remaining hot stock, cover and leave for 5 minutes. Fluff up with a fork and add the fresh coriander, spoon over the beef mince and bake for 20 minutes.
